metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: SQL BETWEEN Operator
The SQL BETWEEN Operator
The BETWEEN operator selects values within a given range. The values can be numbers, text, or dates.
content.html: The BETWEEN operator selects values within a given range. The values can be numbers, text, or dates.

content.text: The BETWEEN operator is inclusive: begin and end values are included.
content.html: The BETWEEN operator is inclusive: begin and end values are included.

syntaxHighlighting.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

content.code: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

syntax_highlighting.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

content.code_html:
SELECT * FROM Products
WHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

syntax_highlighting_data.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

content.text: Syntax

content.code: SELECT column_name(s) FROM table_name WHERE column_name BETWEEN value1 AND value2;

content.text: Demo Database
Below is a selection from the Products table used in the examples:
content.html: Below is a selection from the Products table used in the examples:

content.code_html:
ProductID ProductName SupplierID CategoryID Unit Price
1 Chais 1 1 10 boxes x 20 bags 18
2 Chang 1 1 24 - 12 oz bottles 19
3 Aniseed Syrup 1 2 12 - 550 ml bottles 10
4 Chef Anton's Cajun Seasoning 2 2 48 - 6 oz jars 22
5 Chef Anton's Gumbo Mix 2 2 36 boxes 21.35

content.text: NOT BETWEEN
To display the products outside the range of the previous example, use NOT BETWEEN :
content.html: To display the products outside the range of the previous example, use NOT BETWEEN:

syntaxHighlighting.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price NOT BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

content.code: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price NOT BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

syntax_highlighting.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price NOT BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

content.code_html:
SELECT * FROM Products
WHERE Price NOT BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

syntax_highlighting_data.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price NOT BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

content.text: BETWEEN with IN
The following SQL statement selects all products with a price between 10 and 20. In addition, the CategoryID must be either 1,2, or 3:
content.html: The following SQL statement selects all products with a price between 10 and 20. In addition, the CategoryID must be either 1,2, or 3:

syntaxHighlighting.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20AND CategoryID IN (1,2,3);

content.code: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20AND CategoryID IN (1,2,3);

syntax_highlighting.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20AND CategoryID IN (1,2,3);

content.code_html:
SELECT * FROM Products
WHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20
AND CategoryID IN (1,2,3);

syntax_highlighting_data.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20AND CategoryID IN (1,2,3);

content.text: BETWEEN Text Values
The following SQL statement selects all products with a ProductName alphabetically between Carnarvon Tigers and Mozzarella di Giovanni:
content.html: The following SQL statement selects all products with a ProductName alphabetically between Carnarvon Tigers and Mozzarella di Giovanni:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE ProductName BETWEEN 'Carnarvon Tigers' AND 'Mozzarella 
  di Giovanni'ORDER BY ProductName;

content.code:
SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE ProductName BETWEEN 'Carnarvon Tigers' AND 'Mozzarella
di Giovanni'ORDER BY ProductName;

syntax_highlighting.text:
SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE ProductName BETWEEN 'Carnarvon Tigers' AND 'Mozzarella 
  di Giovanni'ORDER BY ProductName;

content.code_html:
SELECT * FROM Products
WHERE ProductName BETWEEN 'Carnarvon Tigers' AND 'Mozzarella di Giovanni'
ORDER BY ProductName;

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE ProductName BETWEEN 'Carnarvon Tigers' AND 'Mozzarella 
  di Giovanni'ORDER BY ProductName;

content.text: BETWEEN Dates
The following SQL statement selects all orders with an OrderDate between '01-July-1996' and '31-July-1996':
content.html: The following SQL statement selects all orders with an OrderDate between '01-July-1996' and '31-July-1996':

syntaxHighlighting.text: SELECT * FROM OrdersWHERE OrderDate BETWEEN #07/01/1996# AND #07/31/1996#;

content.code: SELECT * FROM OrdersWHERE OrderDate BETWEEN #07/01/1996# AND #07/31/1996#;

syntax_highlighting.text: SELECT * FROM OrdersWHERE OrderDate BETWEEN #07/01/1996# AND #07/31/1996#;

content.code_html:
SELECT * FROM Orders
WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN #07/01/1996# AND #07/31/1996#;

syntax_highlighting_data.text: SELECT * FROM OrdersWHERE OrderDate BETWEEN #07/01/1996# AND #07/31/1996#;

content.text: OR:

syntaxHighlighting.text: SELECT * FROM OrdersWHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '1996-07-01' AND '1996-07-31';

content.text: Exercise ? What is this? Test your skills by answering a few questions about the topics of this page
Which SQL statement selects all products with a price between 10 and 20?
content.html: Which SQL statement selects all products with a price between 10 and 20?

metadata.question: Which SQL statement selects all products with a price between 10 and 20?

options.text: SELECT * FROM Products WHERE Price = 10 AND Price = 20;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE Price >= 10 OR Price <= 20;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE Price LIKE '10-20';

content.question: Which SQL statement selects all products with a price between 10 and 20?

options.text: SELECT * FROM Products WHERE Price = 10 AND Price = 20;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE Price >= 10 OR Price <= 20;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE Price LIKE '10-20';
